p: The chromatographic treatment of the seed ethanol extract led to the isolation of a compound identified by spectral data in comparison to literature data [ 41, 42] as kaempferol 3- O-rutinoside, not previously reported in this plant. The 1H-NMR spectra of this compound showed several peaks in the aromatic region from 6.21 to 8.06 ppm and hydrogens of two sugar units with a signal at 5.12 ppm and another at 4.51 ppm, characteristic of glucose and rhamnose anomeric hydrogen, respectively.
